about_me.des: A passionate Full stack developer with big dreams and ambitions. Writing and structuring quality code is a not just a source of living; it is the thing that excites me and pulls me away from this world. Apart from software I enjoy travelling and playing some guitar!

projects.keybusiness: A web ERP project that was built using Java Spring-Boot , Hibernate , MySQL database and Angular 4 on the frontend.
projects.paracent: A network marketing project with sales , profit sharing .. etc. It was built with Java Jersey , MySQL as a database and JQuery + vanilla JS on the frontend.
projects.wru: An android application to locate contacts and specifically children. built with Java Jersey and MySQL on the database in addition to Android(Java).

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
